name: Angry Neighbours
description:
Decorate your home with colourful tiles! The first player to fill his house wins. Thwart your neighbours by shooting them and stealing their loot, but avoid the zombies that are roaming around. At home you're safe, but you need to venture outside to win...

A fun local multiplayer game for two to four players: it's quick to pick up, but has a lot of replay value.

Using multiple gamepads (XBOX controllers) is recommended, though it can also be played with keyboard, for up to three players.

Keyboard controls:

 P1: WASD + tab

 P2: IJKL + space

 P3: arrows + enter

This is the updated browser version of a game made for the Global Game Jam 2019: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/angry-neighbours

This game was made by:

Erwin Bonsma

Paul Bonsma

Sjoerd Kuperus

Joey Poortman
